channel.title: Adding Female characters?
channel.description: Whenever I make a new character, and turn myself into a girl, it works fine, but then when I start walking anywhere, it turns me back into a guy. How do I add the female characters? And how do I make it so it doesn't turn you into a guy? Help would be appreciated :)
